column2:
"Hey, doing good work out there?
Say, have you been dissatisfied with running Time Attacks one area at a time?"
"I think doing several areas in a row would be better for training your concentration."
"With that in mind, you should start by clearing one of your favourite Time Attacks 1 time. Why not challenge yourself?"
"Of course, everyone has their own way of training, so it's up to you whether you want to take the challenge."
